email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is October 15-20. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s ($50.50 per metric ton). Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Could you consider something in the high 40s? Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concern about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $49.75 per metric ton. Laytime is 72 hours total, and demurrage is $25,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Cheers, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $49.75 sounds more reasonable. However, the demurrage rate is a bit steep. Could we negotiate this down to $20,000 per day? Also, can we confirm the laycan remains October 15-20? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve confirmed with the owner, and we can agree to $20,000 per day for demurrage. The laycan remains October 15-20. If this works for you, I’ll draft the charter party agreement. Let me know. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, that sounds good. Please proceed with drafting the charter party agreement. Let’s finalize the freight rate at $49.75 per metric ton and demurrage at $20,000 per day. Thanks for your flexibility. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great! I’ll prepare the agreement and send it over for your review by end of day. Thanks for the smooth negotiation. Looking forward to working together. Best regards, Sarah
